name: Blood Drive (itch)
description:
It's the zombie apocalypse again, and the hospitals need blood.

The more blood you donate, the higher the score multiplier.

What's your sweet spot for a high score?

Menu controls:

Space / Gamepad A - donate blood.

Enter / Gamepad Start - Start game.

Combat controls:

WASD / Gampad Right analog - move

Mouse1 / Space / Gamepad A - shoot
